X10Runtime::Clock

X10Runtime::Clock Class Reference

#include <x10lib.h>

Detailed Description

Handle for a clock. This retains information on a clock created. This again has the issue of overflow to be handled.

Member Data Documentation

int X10Runtime::Clock::clockId
 

Id to identify the finish scope with the host.
